faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most important questions about Lexora.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Yes, your data is fully protected. We use end-to-end encryption and store all data on EU servers. We never share your data with third parties. You can completely delete your account and all documents at any time.

items.question: Which countries are supported?
items.answer: Lexora currently supports Germany, Austria, and Switzerland with full legal adaptation. Basic functions are also available for other European countries. We are continuously expanding our coverage.

items.question: How accurate is the AI analysis?
items.answer: Our AI achieves over 98% accuracy in document recognition and analysis. It is specially trained on German-language official letters and knows the relevant laws and deadlines.

items.question: Can I edit the generated responses?
items.answer: Absolutely! All responses generated by Lexora can be fully customized. You can change, add, or remove text. The AI can also help you with further adjustments.

items.question: Which file formats are supported?
items.answer: Lexora accepts PDF, JPG, PNG, WEBP, and HEIC files up to 10MB. You can also scan documents directly with your smartphone camera.

items.question: Does Lexora replace a lawyer?
items.answer: Lexora is an AI assistant and not a substitute for legal advice. For complex legal matters, court proceedings, or when large sums are at stake, we always recommend consulting a qualified lawyer.

items.question: How does the free version work?
items.answer: With the free version, you can process one complete case - from analysis to finished response. This is ideal for testing. For regular use, we recommend our Starter or Pro plans.

items.question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. There is no minimum term. After cancellation, you have access to all features until the end of the billing period.
